entry.content:
BEDSTUY

NO FEE
Macon st&Marcy Ave ONE BLOCK FROM THE A/C TRAIN

Stunning brownstone in tree lined block, steps away from the A/C train via Nostrand Av

New gut renovated 1 bedroom
Chef's Kitchen with island and full s.s.appliances
Full modern bathroom with deep tub
Closets space

The Location:
Located in the heart of bedstuy , this unit is easily accessible via both the MTA A/C train
Just steps away from Fulton Avenues where you will find a wide array of shops, restaurants, cafes and bars for your shopping and dining convenience.

~~NO FEE~PETS FRIENDLY
